short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing with TabKeeper, the ultimate Chrome tab manager. Save, organize, and access your tabs easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with TabKeeper, the ultimate solution for tab management on Chrome. Whether you're a multitasker, researcher, or just someone who loves to keep things organized, TabKeeper is designed to make your life easier.

Key Features:

Save Tabs for Later:

Save important tabs and access them even after closing and reopening your browser.
Keep a list of favorite sites handy without cluttering your bookmarks.
Restore Saved Tabs:

Reopen all your saved tabs with a single click.
Perfect for daily workflows or revisiting research sessions.
Drag-and-Drop Sorting:

Organize your open tabs effortlessly using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
Customize the order of your tabs to suit your workflow.
Group Tabs by Window:

View and manage tabs grouped by each browser window.
Ideal for separating work, personal, and research tabs.
Search Functionality:

Quickly find specific tabs by title or URL.
Streamline your browsing by jumping directly to the tab you need.
User-Friendly Interface:

Clean and intuitive design for seamless navigation.
No steep learning curveâ€”get started instantly.
Why Choose TabKeeper?

Boost Productivity: Spend less time searching for tabs and more time focusing on your tasks.
Stay Organized: Keep your browsing sessions tidy and well-organized.
Never Lose a Tab Again: Your saved tabs remain accessible, ensuring you never lose important information.
Get Started Today!

Simplify your browsing and take control of your tabs with TabKeeper. Download now and experience a more organized, efficient way to navigate the web.
